author: chayanit
body:
Dear experts, 

I have added VBFHToZZTo4Nu_M125 and VBFHToBB_M125 2018 workflows as they are missing and needed for HCAL changes study (according to https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-4). I have also found some bugs in relval_steps.py where geometry is missing in Digi, Reco, Harvest steps and PU Minbias was not added in RecoPU17 step  for 2017 relvals. 

Please consider and merge these changes for PdmV. Thank you. 

Cheers,
Chayanit as L3 validation manager in PdmV
title: fixed bugs in relval_step.py and added VBF Hbb Hinv 2018 workflows
